# Add this tablegen include to support stablehlo rewrites with DRR.
list(APPEND IREE_COMPILER_TABLEGEN_INCLUDE_DIRS "${IREE_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party/stablehlo")

iree_add_all_subdirs()

iree_tablegen_library(
  NAME
    PassesIncGen
  TD_FILE
    "Passes.td"
  OUTS
    --gen-pass-decls Passes.h.inc
)

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    PassHeaders
  HDRS
    "Passes.h"
    "Passes.h.inc"
    "Rewriters.h"
  DEPS
    ::PassesIncGen
    MLIRPass
    MLIRTransforms
  PUBLIC
)

iree_tablegen_library(
  NAME
    ComplexLoweringPatterns
  TD_FILE
    "ComplexLoweringPatterns.td"
  OUTS
    --gen-rewriters ComplexLoweringPatterns.h.inc
)

iree_cc_library(

    Preprocessing
  HDRS
    "Passes.h"
    "Rewriters.h"

    "Canonicalization.cpp"
